adHeader: Safe & Reliable Help by College Students: Event Setup, Bartending, etc
adDetails: We are College Labor (collegelabor.org), an online community that connects households and business with eager, pre-screened, friendly college students for affordable Odd Job and Task services in the San Francisco Bay Area! We offer a safer more reliable alternative to most c-list providers at a price well below professional rates. We specialize in Event Help, specifically: Holiday Help, Event Setup, Party Bar-tending, Catering Help, Serving, Party Clean Up, Shopping, or any Odd Jobs and Errands you may need - just inquire! We've worked all types of different events, including: Birthdays, Weddings, Holidays, BBQs, Tailgates, Corporate Outings, Parades, Children's Parties and more! Get Started by filling out a short application describing your job on our website - https://collegelabor.org (please copy and paste, sorry Craigslist no longer allows links) Support your local College Community! Please email us through this ad if you have any questions about how College Labor works, thank you. College Labor Team Follow or Like us on: - Twitter - Facebook - Linkedin - Pinterest
